channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-13203] Procedure v2 - master create/delete table
item.description:
master side, part of HBASE-12439
starts up the procedure executor on the master
and replaces the create/delete table handlers with the procedure version.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Forwarding my +1 from RB for the recent patch at https://reviews.apache.org/r/30070/.
The core patch(HBASE-13202) had some changes related to this which looks good as well: https://github.com/matteobertozzi/hbase/commit/c3139aaa033b87bf676e62c520ebdf839ba12e4e.
committed to master working on a branch-1 patch

FAILURE: Integrated in HBase-TRUNK #6367 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-TRUNK/6367/)
